prompt:
Create a PREMIUM e-commerce hero image of a clear PET storage jar. This is a product photograph that must compete with Lock & Lock, Milton, and Borosil on Amazon India.

REFERENCE IMAGES:
- [lids] shows the ACTUAL blue Pavisha lid (top-right in 2x2 grid) with embossed PAVISHA text and nature relief pattern
- [jars] shows the ACTUAL jar body (middle column, top position) — clear PET with blue 'Blossoms' floral print

THE PRODUCT:
A straight-sided cylindrical clear PET storage jar (~500ml, ~12cm tall, 8cm wide) with:
- BODY: Crystal clear transparent PET with a single continuous printed wrap — blue lily flowers, green leaves, cursive 'Blossoms' text, blue wave motifs, blue diamond geometric accents. Match [jars] artwork EXACTLY.
- LID: Solid blue opaque plastic screw-on cap with embossed 'PAVISHA' text and embossed floral/nature relief pattern on top surface. Match [lids] EXACTLY.

PHOTOGRAPHY BRIEF (shoot this like a ₹50,000 commercial product shoot):

LIGHTING — This is the most critical element:
- KEY LIGHT: Large softbox from upper-left at 45°, soft diffused
- FILL LIGHT: Softer fill from right to prevent harsh shadows
- RIM/BACK LIGHT: TWO strip lights at 4 o'clock and 8 o'clock positions behind the jar. These must create DRAMATIC BRIGHT WHITE GLOWING EDGE HIGHLIGHTS tracing the entire cylindrical contour of the jar on BOTH sides. This rim glow is THE signature look of premium clear container photography — it makes the PET edges look like they're lit from within. This is NON-NEGOTIABLE.
- LID ACCENT: Small overhead spot raking across the lid at ~15° angle to create STRONG directional micro-shadows in every groove of the embossed PAVISHA text and relief pattern. The embossing must POP with visible depth.
- All lights at 5500K neutral daylight

BACKGROUND & SURFACE:
- Pure white background blown out to #FFFFFF — Amazon compliant, no grey, no gradient
- Jar sits on a HIGH-GLOSS BLACK ACRYLIC surface that creates a CRISP, MIRROR-SHARP reflection of the jar base. The reflection should fade gradually downward — sharp at the contact point, soft at the bottom. This reflection is a premium quality signal.

COMPOSITION:
- Product fills 70-75% of frame
- Slight 3/4 rotation (8-10° off center) for dimension — shows front label AND lid top
- Slight elevation (5-8°) so lid embossing is partially visible
- Centered with even margins

MATERIAL RENDERING:
- PET BODY: The transparency must SHINE. Rim light transmitting through the clear PET walls is the hero moment — the edges should glow bright white/blue. Back-side artwork should be faintly visible through the front wall (reversed). The PET should look crystal clear, premium quality, not cheap or cloudy. Subtle specular highlights following the cylindrical form.
- LID: Opaque blue plastic with the embossed relief DRAMATICALLY visible through the raking overhead spot. Every letter of PAVISHA should cast a tiny shadow. The surface should have a subtle form-following highlight.

COLOR & POST-PRODUCTION:
- Colors ELECTRIC — blues should vibrate on screen. Push saturation +15-20% on blues and greens.
- Contrast: High S-curve for depth and punch
- Sharpness: Razor tack sharp — every text character, every flower petal, every embossed groove crisp at 200% zoom
- The final image should STOP someone mid-scroll on Amazon

extraction.target_description: COMPOSE: Blue Pavisha embossed lid from top-right of [lids] + Blossoms PET jar body from middle-column top of [jars]. Create ONE complete product.

fidelity.preserve_colors: Match source images EXACTLY then boost saturation 15-20% in post. Blues should be electric.
fidelity.preserve_artwork: Blossoms print from [jars] — exact flowers, exact text, exact pattern. ONE continuous wrap.
fidelity.preserve_text: 'Blossoms' cursive from [jars]. 'PAVISHA' embossed from [lids]. Both must be CRISP.
fidelity.preserve_shape: Straight cylinder. No hourglass. No taper. Uniform width.
fidelity.hero_features: 1) Dramatic PET edge glow from rim lights 2) PAVISHA embossed lid with shadow depth 3) Crystal clear PET transparency

background.color: pure white #FFFFFF — Amazon compliant, blown out, no grey

lighting.direction: Key: upper-left 45° softbox. Fill: right softer. DUAL RIM: strip lights at 4 and 8 o'clock behind jar for DRAMATIC edge glow. Lid accent: overhead spot raking at 15° for embossing shadows.
lighting.quality: Key/fill soft. Rim lights HARD and BRIGHT — razor specular edges. Lid spot hard and directional.
lighting.shadows: Strong contact shadow on glossy surface. Micro-shadows in lid embossing.
lighting.special_requirements: The DUAL RIM LIGHTS must create BRIGHT WHITE GLOWING EDGES on BOTH sides of the jar cylinder. This is the defining look. The PET edges should appear to glow. This is how Lock & Lock and Borosil photograph clear containers.

composition.camera_angle: Slight 3/4 rotation (8-10°) + slight elevation (5-8°). Shows front label + lid top.

material_treatment.rendering_notes:
PET BODY: Rim light transmits through walls creating GLOWING EDGES. Crystal clear, not cloudy. Back-side print faintly visible reversed through front. Subtle specular band following cylinder form.
LID: Opaque blue with DRAMATIC embossed relief — raking light carves out every groove of PAVISHA text and pattern with visible micro-shadows.
material_treatment.preserve_details: Edge glow, embossing depth, PET clarity, print sharpness

enhancement.sharpness: RAZOR tack sharp — every character, petal, groove visible at 200%
enhancement.contrast: HIGH S-curve — deep blacks in reflection, bright whites on rim highlights, punchy midtones
enhancement.color_treatment: Electric blues (+15-20% saturation), vivid greens. Colors should vibrate on a phone screen.
enhancement.detail_enhancement: Rim edge glow, lid embossing shadows, PET surface quality, reflection clarity

focus.focus_point: Entire product — front label through lid

custom_spec.instruction: This must look like it was shot by a professional product photographer with a ₹50,000 lighting rig. The rim glow on the PET edges and the mirror reflection on the glossy black surface are the two signature elements that separate premium from budget product photography. DO NOT compromise on the rim lighting — it is the single most important visual element.
custom_spec.artistic_intent: Trust-building commercial photography. When an Indian shopper sees this on Amazon among 50 other storage jar listings, this image should make them stop and click. Premium, aspirational, trustworthy.
